methods.name: dummyOpUp
methods.desc: Dummy Op UpDummy operation to get more opcode budget@i- The number to return, necssary to deduplicate the name

returns.desc: the number (but we do nothing with it)

methods.name: scalarMultBase
methods.desc: Scalar Mult BaseScalar multiplication of the base point@scalar- The scalar to multiply the basepoint by.

methods.name: scalarMult
methods.desc: Scalar MultScalar multiplication with a supplied point@scalar- The scalar to multiply the point with@point- The point that is multiplied with the scalar

methods.name: validPoint
methods.desc: validPointChecks if the point is valid (on curve)@point- The point to check

returns.desc: true if the point is valid, false otherwise

methods.name: pointAdd
methods.desc: Point addAdds two points on the curve
